00019 bool Driver::parse_stream(std::istream& in, const std::string& sname)
00020 {
00021     streamname = sname;
00022 
00023     Scanner scanner(&in);
00024     scanner.set_debug(trace_scanning);

00032 bool Driver::parse_file(const std::string &filename)
00033 {
00034     std::ifstream in(filename.c_str());
00035     if (!in.good()) return false;
00036     return parse_stream(in, filename);
00037 }

00040 {
00041     std::istringstream iss(input);
00042     return parse_stream(iss, sname);
